description:
Shola sports khaki shorts and sandy accoutrements inspired by various British divisions, including the Desert Rats, famous for their role in the North African Campaign. It might seem like a recipe for a grazed knee but the shorts and rolled sleeves are perfect for the hellish climateâ€¦

Desert Rat Shola Outfit
MAB 38 SMG Bundle
Zombie Wrapped Weapon Skins
Story Charm Pack
name: Zombie Army 4: Desert Rat Shola Bundle
